languages.text: "Я была избрана для служения. Но кроме того — скажу не таясь — мало что доставляет мне столько радости, как мысль, что падающий под моим выстрелом еретик более не сделает сиротой ни одну имперскую девочку".

traits.locale_text: "Я была избрана для служения. Но кроме того — скажу не таясь — мало что доставляет мне столько радости, как мысль, что падающий под моим выстрелом еретик более не сделает сиротой ни одну имперскую девочку".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."
languages.original_text: "Я была избрана для служения. Но кроме того — скажу не таясь — мало что доставляет мне столько радости, как мысль, что падающий под моим выстрелом еретик более не сделает сиротой ни одну имперскую девочку".

traits.locale_text: "I was chosen for servitude. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan an Imperial girl."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was chosen for servitude. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan an Imperial girl."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan an Imperial girl."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan an Imperial girl."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “帝皇选择我来侍奉祂。但除此之外我并不否认——每当我一想到，那些被我射杀的异端分子再也无法让别的孩子沦为孤儿，我就会感到兴奋不已。”
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇选择我来侍奉祂。但除此之外我并不否认——每当我一想到，那些被我射杀的异端分子再也无法让别的帝国女孩沦为孤儿，我就会感到兴奋不已。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

languages.text: «Fui elegida para servir. Pero más allá de eso, no negaré que hay pocas cosas que me emocionen más que pensar que el hereje a quien abato nunca dejará huérfana a otra niña».
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: «Fui elegida para servir. Pero más allá de eso, no negaré que hay pocas cosas que me emocionen más que pensar que el hereje a quien abato nunca dejará huérfana a otra niña del Imperium».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は奉仕するために選ばれた。だが、それ以上に…私の一撃で倒された異端者が、二度と孤児を生み出すことがないだろうという思いほどに、私を昂揚させるものはないということも、否定はできない」
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: 「私は奉仕するために選ばれた。だが、それ以上に…私の一撃で倒された異端者が、二度と孤児を生み出すことがないだろうという思いほどに、私を昂揚させるものはないということも、否定はできない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wurde dazu auserwählt, zu dienen. Doch darüber hinaus, ich leugne es nicht, erfreut mich wenig so sehr wie der Gedanke, dass der durch meinen Schuss gefallene Ketzer nie wieder ein Kind zum Waisen machen kann."
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde dazu auserwählt, zu dienen. Doch darüber hinaus, ich leugne es nicht, erfreut mich wenig so sehr wie der Gedanke, dass er durch meinen Schuss gefallene Ketzer nie wieder ein imperiales Mädchen zum Waisenkind machen kann."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai été choisie pour servir. Mais au-delà de ça, je ne le nierai pas, peu de choses m'exaltent autant que de me dire que l'hérétique défait par mon arme ne laissera plus jamais derrière lui une orpheline. »
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été choisie pour servir. Mais au-delà de ça, je ne le nierai pas, peu de choses m'exaltent autant que de me dire que l'hérétique défait par mon arme ne laissera plus jamais derrière lui une orpheline impériale. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hizmet etmek için seçildim ben. Fakat bundan öte inkâr etmeyeceğim bir şey var: Ecelini getirdiğim kâfirlerin, hiçbir çocuğu öksüz bırakamayacağını düşündükçe öyle neşeleniyorum ki."
languages.original_text: "I was chosen to serve. But beyond that — I won't deny it — few things elate me as much as the thought that the heretic felled by my shot will never again orphan a child."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmet etmek için seçildim ben. Fakat bundan öte inkâr etmeyeceğim bir şey var: Ecelini getirdiğim kâfirlerin, hiçbir çocuğu öksüz bırakamayacağını düşündükçe öyle neşeleniyorum ki."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
